span.style: border: 1px solid rgb(129, 129, 81); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 225); font-size: x-small; white-space: nowrap; padding:0px 2px;

dl.dd: A space-separated list of search component names, each of which implements the interface("nsIAutoCompleteSearch") interface. The components are created using the name @mozilla.org/autocomplete/search;1?name= where name is listed in this attribute.

ul.li: search-autocomplete: fx_minversion_inline("1.5")Requires SeaMonkey 2.1 The user's default search engine's suggestions are searched.
places-tag-autocomplete: fx_minversion_inline("3.5")Requires SeaMonkey 2.1 The user's Places tags are searched.
mydomain: tb_minversion_inline("3.0")Requires SeaMonkey 2.0 The user's email domain is suggested.
history: fx_minversion_inline("1.0")Requires SeaMonkey 2.0 The user's URL history is searched.
form-history: fx_minversion_inline("1.0")Requires SeaMonkey 2.0 Search the values that the user has entered into form fields.
file: gecko_minversion_inline("1.8.1")(Linux only) The local file system is searched.
addrbook: tb_minversion_inline("3.0")Requires SeaMonkey 2.0 The user's address book is searched.
